tr.td: Alva is dealing with issues with his ileostomy. He is protein malnourished and may not be an ideal candidate for any major surgery. He will undergo repeat evlauation for his right knee to see his surgical candidacy. In the interm period, we will remeasure for velcro stockings to minimize leg swelling.
Gastroenterologist Referral for Irritable bowel syndrome Referring Physician: Timothy Dao, Cardiology, (972) 985-8838 Encounter Date: 08/25/2020
